metadata.name: After The Storm
metadata.description:
'After The Storm'  
New Forest, England

Artist - Michael Hartley

A summer's evening in the South of England. Stopping for an hour in a quiet part of the New Forest. Minimal gear. Epic clouds. Deer. Shadows are getting longer.

An ancient tree has stood through many seasons. A beautiful presence before the most recent storm. A beautiful presence after.

----

Michael Hartley - An English photo artist living on the South Coast. A passion for exploring rocky coastlines and ancient forests.. creating in response to nature. Processing in black and white, often in a minimalist, spacious style. (2022)



Date Taken - 1st June 2022 - 18:27  
Location - 50.868807, -1.689904  
Camera - Nikon D5500  
Lens - Sigma 17-50mm with ND Filters  
Capture Settings - 26mm, 5.7 minutes at f/7.1 and ISO 100, tripod mounted



License - Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with artist.



Declaration - The image (After The Storm) will never be replicated as a 1/1 nft edition, in an nft collection, nft composite, or in any form of digital art. There will be no more than 50 editions.
